title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 300.24 - Nonschedule adjustments under section 15(5-b) of the workers' compensation law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 300.24 - Nonschedule adjustments under section 15(5-b) of the workers' compensation law

State Regulations

Proceedings under subdivision 5-b of section 15 for
approval of nonschedule adjustments may be conducted by a member of the board
or a panel of the board. A member of the board may be designated by the
chairman to act individually in the hearing and determination of such
nonschedule adjustments pursuant to section 15, subdivision 5-b. Referees shall
have no authority to approve such adjustments. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
300.24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
